name: illucid
description:
Game Description

Illucid is a single-player 3d first-person puzzle game where players can use optical illusions to deform objects. The unexpected ways the objects change shapes and sizes from different fields of view make the player feel like they are engaging in a lucid dream.

User Control ActionKeyBoard + MouseMoveWASDJumpSpaceRotate CameraMouse movementGrab/Drop/CutMouse left clickChange FOVMouse scroll Team ArtCS/DevelopersMusicMark LinSoso Song (Lead)Shijie JinRuby TranSandy Shang
Fish YuRyan KaoSherry Wang
